channel.title: Home on Kelly Fan
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Kelly Fan

item.title: Serendipity
item.description: Final Product “Great things happen when it’s least expected”. With the only intention of wanting to find out whether a fabric would be able to hold the dye, it was unexpected to receive the beautiful mixture of colours using a single colour of dye. This piece is a representation of the unexpected good things that happened in life.

item.title: Seize the Moment
item.description: Triumph (Screen-print & Paint on Fabric) Conquering hardships is the journey of growth. This piece was created during the time when I was about to leave high school, home, and ’expand my wings’ to explore the next chapter in life. Made with a combination of screen-printing and painting on fabric in large scale bold colour, with the intention of depicting a grand look.

item.title: Bio
item.description: With a passion for design and love for all things creative, I thrive in environments where innovation and style intersects. From coming with new concepts to collaborating on projects, I find joy in pushing the boundaries of conventional fashion and exploring new realms of artistic expression. Alongside my passion for design, I bring to the table exceptional organizational and management skills. My ability to maintain clarity amidst complexity allows me to execute projects with efficiency and precision, ensuring that every endeavour I undertake is a testament to both creativity and meticulous planning.
